titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 1170676-1170715

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Correspondence of John F. Herrity - Board of Supervisors Chairperson, 1972-1988. Local government reecords collection. Fairfax County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Fairfax County under the accession number 42347.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: John F. Herrity was a member of the Fairfax County (Va.) Board of Supervisors as a representative of the Springfield district from 1971 to 1975. He served as chairperson of the Fairfax County (Va.) Board of Supervisors from 1976-1988.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Correspondence of John F. Herrity - Board of Supervisors Chairperson, 1971-1988, includes correspondence from his time as represenative of the Springield district from 1971 to 1975 and as Chairperson from 1976-1988.
